languages.text: "Теперь, когда душа Ирлиэт осталась без защиты, ненасытный взгляд Той, Что Жаждет будет вечно направлен в ее сторону. И если Изгой погибнет, ее душа уже никогда не воссоединится с предками в Контуре Бесконечности — ибо Сай'лантреш пожрет ее в тот же миг".

"Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."
languages.original_text: "Теперь, когда душа Ирлиэт осталась без защиты, ненасытный взгляд Той, Что Жаждет будет вечно направлен в ее сторону. И если Изгой погибнет, ее душа уже никогда не воссоединится с предками в Контуре Бесконечности — ибо Сай'лантреш пожрет ее в тот же миг".

traits.locale_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it that exact moment."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如今，伊莉耶特的灵魂已经失去了保护，饥渴女士将永远垂涎她的灵魂。在流浪者死去的那一刻，她的灵魂将无法重归先祖的永恒回路，而会被赛·兰斯雷什当场吞噬。”
languages.original_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."

traits.locale_text: “如今，伊莉耶特的灵魂已经失去了保护，饥渴女士将永远垂涎她的灵魂。在流浪者死去的那一刻，她的灵魂将无法重归先祖的永恒回路，而会被赛·兰斯雷什当场吞噬。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Ahora que el alma de Yrliet ha quedado desprotegida, la insaciable mirada de la Sedienta nunca se apartará de ella. Y si la proscrita muere, su alma nunca podrá unirse a las de sus ancestros en el Circuito Infinito; Sai'lanthresh la devorará en ese preciso instante».
languages.original_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que el alma de Yrliet ha quedado desprotegida, la insaciable mirada de la Sedienta nunca se apartará de ella. Y si la proscrita muere, su alma nunca podrá unirse a las de sus ancestros en el Circuito Infinito; Sai'lanthresh la devorará en ese preciso instante».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Maintenant que l'âme d'Yrliet n'est plus protégée, elle ne manquera pas d'attirer l'attention de l'Assoiffée qui la poursuivra sans relâche. Et lorsque l'Errante viendra à mourir, son âme sera incapable de rejoindre ses ancêtres dans le Circuit d'Infinité : Sai'lanthresh la dévorera immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que l'âme d'Yrliet n'est plus protégée, elle ne manquera pas d'attirer l'attention de l'Assoiffée qui la poursuivra sans relâche. Et lorsque l'Errante viendra à mourir, son âme sera incapable de rejoindre ses ancêtres dans le Circuit d'Infinité : Sai'lanthresh la dévorera immédiatement. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Da Yrliets Seele nun ungeschützt ist, wird der unersättliche Blick von Ihr, die dürstet, für immer auf ihr ruhen. Und wenn die Ausgestoßene stirbt, wird ihre Seele sich niemals zu ihren Ahnen in der Unendlichkeitsmatrix gesellen können – im selben Moment wird Sai'lanthresh sie verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."

traits.locale_text: "Da Yrliets Seele nun ungeschützt ist, wird der unersättliche Blick von Ihr, die dürstet, für immer auf ihr ruhen. Und wenn die Ausgestoßene stirbt, wird ihre Seele sich niemals zu ihren Ahnen in der Unendlichkeitsmatrix gesellen können – im selben Moment wird Sai'lanthresh sie verschlingen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「今、ユリエットの魂は無防備なまま残され、かの渇きたる女の飽くなき視線が永遠に彼女に注がれている。そして、もし追放者が死ねば、彼女の魂は無限回路で父祖と合流することはできなくなるだろう。そして…その瞬間、セランスレッシュがそれを食い尽くすのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."

traits.locale_text: 「今、ユリエットの魂は無防備なまま残され、かの渇きたる女の飽くなき視線が永遠に彼女に注がれている。そして、もし追放者が死ねば、彼女の魂は無限回路で父祖と合流することはできなくなるだろう。そして…その瞬間、セランスレッシュがそれを食い尽くすのだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yrliet'in ruhu korumasız kaldığı için Susayan'ın doyumsuz bakışları, sonsuza dek onun üzerinde olacak. Yurtsuz ölürse ruhu asla Ebedî Devre'deki atalarına kavuşamayacak. Sai'lanthresh, ruhunu anında tüketecek."
languages.original_text: "Now that Yrliet's soul is left without protection, the insatiable gaze of She Who Thirsts will forever be trained upon her. And if the Outcast dies, her soul will never be able to join her ancestors in the Infinity Circuit — Sai'lanthresh will devour it in that very moment."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet'in ruhu korumasız kaldığı için Susayan'ın doyumsuz bakışları sonsuza dek onun üzerinde olacak. Yurtsuz ölürse ruhu asla Ebedî Devre'deki atalarına kavuşamayacak. Sai'lanthresh, ruhunu anında tüketecek."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
